message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'd be willing to pay $105. What do you think?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can see that you really want this product. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $108. What do you think?
